text:
Oh yeah I'm Ollie, and today you 
are learning English with Vikings!

The series follows the warrior Ragnar 
Lothbrok and his crew exploring and

fighting for lands across the ocean, while he 
rises and becomes the King of Viking tribes.

But before we jump into the lesson, know that if 
you are new here our channel has helped learners

from all around the world to achieve their dream 
of speaking English, just like this fan, who says

that their vocabulary has gone to the next level.
We want to help you become fluent too

and understand fast speaking 
natives without getting lost,

without missing the jokes and without subtitles.
So just hit that Subscribe button and the

Bell down below so you don't 
miss any of our new lessons!

Isn't it incredible how there's a Friends scene 
for every piece of vocabulary we need to learn?

Even one that fits in a 
story from the 8th Century.

Well that's why we have created a course for you 
to learn with Friends. It will help you improve

your English like nothing else and you can try 
it for FREE today with our 3-Part Masterclass.
I'm sure you're gonna love it, so you can click up

here or down in the description below 
to sign up now and get started today.

Now if you want to learn more about how to 
become a successful English learner and not

feel like you're failing, then I recommend you 
binge watch our other channel RealLife English,

which is full of tips to help you on your 
journey of becoming a fluent English speaker.
Now let's get on with the quiz!
